sentences.sContent: The referee whistled and the game began.
sentences.sCn: 裁判哨声一响，比赛开始了。

synos.tran: 口哨；[铁路][船]汽笛；啸啸声

remMethod.val: w ＋ hist(嘘) ＋ le → 吹口哨； 发音记忆： “猥琐” → 对女孩子吹口哨很猥琐 → 吹口哨

words.tran: 发出哨声的；听起来像哨声的

trans.tranCn: 吹口哨， 鸣笛声； 呼啸而过
trans.tranOther: to make a high sound by blowing into a whistle
a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it
